original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.27. Sappaccayadukādi, Kusalattika🔽Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Sappaccayaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  sa paccaya duka ādi kusala ttika  sappaccayam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  sappaccayam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Sappaccayaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naappaccayo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sappaccayam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na appaccayaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka saṅkhittam sappaccaya sadisa
